name: Killchamber
description:
Killchamber is a pixel-art, Sekiro-inspired boss rush. 

This first upload is a vertical slice of what the future game could be. It only contains the tutorial boss, and a very simple game loop.

This release pretends to be a prototype, so feel free to share your experience and proposing improvements!

Controller is recommended.

Developed by Cabreira

Music: "Lost World" by Darren Curtis

Xbox buttons sprites by zaphgames (opengameart)
